meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bernard McGrath Bob Zeigler Ann Wright Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1741.

td.p: Bernard McGrath, a freelance editor from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Bob Zeigler, an attorney from Indianapolis, Indiana
Ann Wright, an immunologist from Agua Dulce, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $10,900)

tr.td: PAPER
CRIMINAL NICKNAMES
SINGERS
PSYCH 101
JUST DESSERTS
"P"s & "Q"s
(Alex: Each of the correct responses will begin with one, the other or perhaps both of those letters of the alphabet.)

tr.td: Ann
Bob

THE LOW COUNTRIES
BRITISH NOVELS
EARTH SCIENCE
WARS
DOGS

Gouda

AnnBobBernard
Triple Stumper
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ann
Bob
Bernard

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Bernard] Utah is number 3.)
...
(Alex: [To Bob] California has 5 national parks, or, 6 national parks, and it is in 2nd place.)
...
(Alex: The correct response is, What is [*], the largest state, lot of room, people concerned about preservation.)
BernardWhat is Utah?
$4,799
BobWhat is Calif?
$5,700
AnnWhat is California
$5,000
Alaska')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'With 8, this state has the most national parks')

tr.td: THE U.S.A.
With 8, this state has the most national parks
Ann
Bob
Bernard
3-day champion: $13,000
2nd place: trip to Seoul, Korea
3rd place: Sanyo stereo + Nintendo Entertainment System and games
Ann
Bob
Bernard

17 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

17 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W

14 R,
5 W
(including 1 DD)
